title: HPI 14 - World on a String - The Bhagavad-Gita
itunes:title: HPI 14 - World on a String - The Bhagavad-Gita
description: The Bhagavad-Gītā or “Song of the Lord” from the Mahābhārata ties its theory of detached action to an innovative conception of the divine.
content:encoded: The Bhagavad-Gītā or “Song of the Lord” from the Mahābhārata ties its theory of detached action to an innovative conception of the divine.
